definition: a tacit mutual understanding
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before
(negative prefix)/not/no
surname Xuan
to declare (publicly)/to announce

sentences.english: Now it goes without saying that we all know what virginity is.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們都心照不宣，知道什麼是童貞。

sentences.english: The blond groom poured Lucy a glass of wine and smiled knowingly.
sentences.chinese: 金髮新郞給露西倒了一杯葡萄酒，心照不宣地微笑着。

sentences.english: I have a past, have been liaising with Aling tacitly burst out laughing.
sentences.chinese: 我一過去，便與阿玲心照不宣地笑起來。

sentences.english: He smiled knowingly, and went back to his book.
sentences.chinese: 他心照不宣地笑笑，然後又返回到他的書上。
